html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02962025-03-06GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Iran) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (IRAN) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add three (3) individuals and four (4) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs (2) expand the scope of the listing criteria by adding a new listing criterion to capture individuals and entities engaged in destabilizing activities in the Middle East region and globally that undermine international peace, security or stability in a manner that is consistent with the Iranian regime's destabilizing policies; and (3) add a new listing criterion to designate any current or former senior government officials, beyond senior Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) officials.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0084 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (IRAN) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add three (3) individuals and four (4) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs (2) expand the scope of the listing criteria by adding a new listing criterion to capture individuals and entities engaged in destabilizing activities in the Middle East region and globally that undermine international peace, security or stability in a manner that is consistent with the Iranian regime's destabilizing policies; and (3) add a new listing criterion to designate any current or former senior government officials, beyond senior Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) officials.
